meanings.definition: The quality or state of being congruous.
meanings.sent1: The congruousness of the colors in the painting made it pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent2: The congruousness of their outfits at the party showed great coordination.
meanings.sent3: The congruousness of the mismatched socks was unintentional but amusing.
meanings.sent4: The congruousness of the music and the dance created a perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The congruousness of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being in agreement or harmony.
meanings.sent1: The congruousness of their opinions led to a successful collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The congruousness of their voices in the choir created beautiful music.
meanings.sent3: The congruousness of the cats and dogs living together was surprising but amusing.
meanings.sent4: The congruousness of the team's efforts resulted in a flawless performance.
meanings.sent5: The congruousness of the ingredients in the recipe made it delicious.
